title: Appoint Bipin Kabra as CFO, NCLT directs RattanIndia Finance - Economic Times
content: Appoint Bipin Kabra as CFO, NCLT directs RattanIndia Finance  Economic Times
description: "Respondent No 1 (RattanIndia Finance) shall issue an appropriate order appointing Bipin Kabra as CFO of the company," said the bench presided by judicial member BV Balram Das in its order of March 29. "Bipin Kabra, after being appointed as CFO, shall disclose all particulars about his concern and interests in any other company or companies."
